snippet: The Dow and S.&P. indexes regained ground that put them ahead for the year.
abstract: Stock market rises sharply again; Dow Jones Industrial average is up about 700 points, or 4 percent, for week.
lead_paragraph: The Dow and S.&P. indexes regained ground that put them ahead for the year.

headline.main: Oil Prices Recover, and Stocks Sprint Higher Again
headline.print_headline: Oil Prices Recover, and Stocks Sprint Higher Again
